verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thlahai chu riebûka inthawkin inphâr po po le thipût po po le mithi leia pawrche taphawt chu sie suok vawng dingin thu pe rawh
a nuhmei a pasalin i sie suokin riebûk puoah i sie ding a nih; a lai taka ka umna hlak an riebûk chu an sukpawrche nawna dingin,” tiin
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chun chuong ang chun an thawh a, riebûk puoah an sie dawk a; LALPAIN Mosie kuoma a hril angin Israel thlahai chun an thawh a.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thlahai kuomah hril la, ‘Pasalin amanih, nuhmeiin amanih Lalpa ringna bawsein mihriem thaw hlak suol ieng el khawm a thaw chun, chu mi chu thiemnaw chang a nih;
a suksuolnaa chun thupha a chawi ding a nih; chun, a suksuol man chu kimtaka thung ding a na, a hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat a suk- suolnapa chu a pêk belsa ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, mi chun suol man intêltu ding laibung a nei naw chun, a suksuol man chu LALPA kuomah inhlân a ta, thiempu chanpuol ding nîng a tih, a ta dinga intlanna berâmchal a siem bâka chun.
Chun, Israel thlahai thil inthieng a thêna thên thilinhlân po po, thiempu kuoma inhlân taphawt chu thiempu chanpuol nîng a ta.
Mi tin thil inthieng chu thiempu chanpuol nîng a tih, miin thiempu a pêk taphawt chu thiempu chanpuol nîng a tih,’ tiin,” a ta.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thlahai kuomah hril la, an kuomah, ‘Nuhmeiin khaw dang nghain a pasal suolsan sienla,
miin zâlpui sienla, a pasalin hre si naw sienla: chuong anga a um zing a, insukpawrche zing pum siin, lân phuong si loin, hretu khawm um si lo, man ni naw sienla;
chun, thîkna lungril putin a nuhmei chu thîkin lo insukpawrche ta si naw sienla amanih,

chuong ang a ni chun a pasal chun a ta dinga thilinhlân buṭei beiphit epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat chawiin a nuhmei chu thiempu kuomah a ṭhuoi ding a nih, hriek a buok ding a ni nawh a, riminhnik a nâl ding a ni bawk nawh; thîk inthâwina fâkmi thilinhlân, hriet zingna thilinhlân rîtlona hriet suokna a ni leiin.
Thiempu hung ṭhuoi a ta, LALPA hmaa chun inngîrtir a tih;
thiempu chun pil bêlin tui inthieng lâng a ta, biekbûk ṭuong pilvut lâng a ta, tuia chun phul a tih.

Thiempu chun nuhmei chu LALPA hmaah inngirtir a ta, a sam inthlatir a ta, hriet zingna fâkmi thilinhlân, thîk inthâwina thilinhlân chu a kutah inchawitir a ta; thiempu chun ṭawngsie intlungtirtu khâkna tui chu chawi a tih.

Chun, thiempu chun nuhmei chu ṭawng inkhâmtir a ta, nuhmei kuoma chun, I pasal ni lo mi dang tukhawma an zâlpui naw cheh a, pawrchena tieng i la fe pet naw chun ṭawngsie intlungtirtu, hi tui khaa inthawk hin fihlîm i tih.
Amiruokchu, khaw dang nghaa i lo pawrche a, i pasal ni lo mi tuin amanih a zâlpui che chun fihlîm naw ti nih, a ti ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun nuhmei chu vau a ta, ṭawng inkhâmtir a ta, nuhmei kuomah thiempu chun, LALPAIN i êlpui a sukthlam a, i phîng a sukvûng chun LALPAIN i chipuihai lai ṭawngsephurin siem raw se che.
Ṭawngsie intlungtirtu hi tui hi i rilah lût a ta, i phing sukvûng a ta, i êlpui sukchêr a tih, tîng a ta; chun, nuhmei chun, Amen, Amen a lo ti ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun chuong ṭawngsie thuhai chu lekhabuah ziek a ta, khâkna tui chun inchieng a tih:
chun, nuhmei chu ṭawngsie in- tlungtirtu khâkna tui chu indâwn- tir bawk a tih: chuongchun, ṭawng- sie intlungtirtu tui chu a phîng sûngah lût a ta, nasatakin hung nâng a tih.
Chun, thiempu chun thîkna thilinhlân chu nuhmei kuta inthawk lâng a ta, LALPA hmaah fâkmi thilinhlân chu thên a ta; mâichâma chun fepui a ta,
thiempu chun fâkmi thilinhlân hriet zingna ding chu vei khat lâng a ta, mâichâma chun rawng a ta, chu zo chun tui chu nuhmei chu ân dâwntir ding a nih.

Tui a hang indâwntir chun a lo pawrche a, a pasal chunga thil a lo suksuol chun ṭawngsie intlungtirtu tui chu a phîng sûngah lût a ta, nasatakin hung nâng a ta, a phîng chu hung invûng a ta, a êlpui chu hung chêr a ta, chuongchun, nuhmei chu a chipuihai lai ṭawngsephur hung nîng a tih.
Amiruokchu, nuhmei chu a lo pawrche nawh a, ân thieng chun fihlîm a ta, nau vawn thei pei hung nîng a tih.
Hi hi, nuhmei, khaw dang nghaa, a pasal ni lo, mi dang le lo insukpawrche amanih,
pasalin thîkna lungril a hung put a, a nuhmei a thîk amanih a rêl dân chu a nih; chuongchun, LALPA hmaah ṭhuoi a ta, thiempu chun hieng dân ang po po hin a chungah a thaw ding a nih.
Chuongchun, pasal chu rîtlonaa chun fihlîm a ta, nuhmei chun a suolna maw chu phur a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
